Class.name: web.DHCBillReconciliations
Class.Description: 名称: web.DHCBillReconciliations.cls 描述: 第三方对账 编写者：ZhYW 编写日期: 2018-03-23

Query.name: FindHospital
Query.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-23 Description: 查询支付渠道 Input: Output: Debug: do ##class(%ResultSet).RunQuery("web.DHCBillReconciliations","FindHospital")

Method.name: FindHospitalExecute
Method.Implementation:
set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1 set rowId="" set desc="全部" do OutputHospital set rowId="0" for set rowId=$o(^CT("HOSP",rowId)) quit:(rowId="") do .set info=$g(^CT("HOSP",rowId)) .quit:(info="") .set desc=$p(info,"^",2) .do OutputHospital
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK
OutputHospital set Data=$lb(rowId,desc) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

Query.name: FindPayChannel
Query.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-23 Description: 查询支付渠道 Input: Output: Debug: do ##class(%ResultSet).RunQuery("web.DHCBillReconciliations","FindPayChannel")

Method.name: FindPayChannelExecute
Method.Implementation:
set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1 set rowId="" set desc="全部" do OutputPayChannel set paymDR="" for set paymDR=$o(^User.DHCCTPayModeExpI("PMEPayModeDRIndex",paymDR)) quit:(paymDR="") do .set rowId=$p(paymDR," ",2) .quit:(+rowId=0) .set desc=$p($g(^CT("CTPM",rowId)),"^",2) .do OutputPayChannel
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK
OutputPayChannel set Data=$lb(rowId,desc) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

Query.name: FindBankTradeDetails
Query.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-23 Description: 查询第三方交易明细 Input: Output: Debug: do ##class(%ResultSet).RunQuery("web.DHCBillReconciliations","FindBankTradeDetails")

Method.name: FindBankTradeDetailsExecute
Method.Implementation:
set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ^tempwml("FindBankTradeDetails")=$lb(stDate,endDate,hospDR) set ind=1 set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate) set bankTradeTotalSum=0 for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set rowId="0" .for set rowId=$o(^DHCBILLETBi(0,"FinDate",date,rowId)) quit:rowId="" do ..s OutTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",12) //订单号 ..s TradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",5) //交易流水号 ..s Terminal=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",7) //终端号 ..s TradeDate=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",1) ..s TradeDate=$zd(TradeDate,3) //交易日期 ..s TradeTime=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",2) ..s TradeTime=$zt(TradeTime,1) //交易时间 ..s TradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",3) //交易金额 ..s TradeFlag=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(rowId)),"^",4) //交易类型 ..if TradeFlag="0" set bankTradeType="扣费" set TradeAmt=TradeAmt ..if TradeFlag="1" set bankTradeType="退费" set TradeAmt=0-TradeAmt ..s bankTradeTotalSum=bankTradeTotalSum+TradeAmt //合计金额 ..do OutputBankTradeDetails
set (TradeNo, Terminal, bankTradeType, TradeAmt, TradeDate,TradeTime,OutTradeNo)="" set TradeNo="合计" set TradeAmt=bankTradeTotalSum do OutputBankTradeDetails
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK
OutputBankTradeDetails set Data=$lb(TradeNo, Terminal, bankTradeType, TradeAmt, TradeDate,TradeTime,OutTradeNo) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content:
/* ClassMethod FindBankTradeDetailsExecute(ByRef qHandle As %Binary, stDate As %String, endDate As %String, hospDR As %String) As %Status { set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1
set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate)
set bankTradeTotalSum=0
for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set rowId="0" .for set rowId=$o(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceI("BANKFINDATE",date,rowId)) quit:(rowId="") do ..set bankTradeNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),5) //银行交易流水号 ..set hisTradeNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),7) //订单号 ..set terminalNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),11) //交易终端号 ..set myHospDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),9) ..quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=myHospDR)) ..set hospName="" ..if (+myHospDR'=0) set hospName=$p(^CT("HOSP",myHospDR),"^",2) ..set trannelNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),15) //渠道代码 ..set paymDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),10) ..set paymDesc="" ..if (+paymDR'=0) set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ..set userDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),16) ..set userName="" ..if (+userDR'=0) set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ..set hisTradeTime=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),8) //yyyyMMddHHmmss ..set tradeDate=$e(hisTradeTime,1,8) ..set tradeDate=$zdh(tradeDate,8) ..set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(tradeDate) //HIS交易日期 ..set tradeTime=$e(hisTradeTime,9,10)_":"_$e(hisTradeTime,11,12)_":"_$e(hisTradeTime,13,14) //HIS交易时间 ..set tradeFlag=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),13) ..set bankTradeType="" ..if (+tradeFlag=0) set bankTradeType="扣费" ..if (+tradeFlag=1) set bankTradeType="退费" ..set bankTradeAmt=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),12) //银行交易金额 ..//set bankTradeAmt=$fn(bankTradeAmt/100,"",2) ..if (+tradeFlag=0) set tradeTotalSum=tradeTotalSum+bankTradeAmt ..if (+tradeFlag=1) set tradeTotalSum=tradeTotalSum-bankTradeAmt ..set bankTradeTime=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(rowId),6) ..set bankTradeDate=$e(bankTradeTime,1,8) ..set bankTradeDate=$zdh(bankTradeDate,8) ..set bankTradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(bankTradeDate) ..set bankTradeTime=$e(bankTradeTime,9,10)_":"_$e(bankTradeTime,11,12)_":"_$e(bankTradeTime,13,14) ..do OutputBankTradeDetails
set (terminalNo, bankTradeType, bankTradeDate, bankTradeTime, hisTradeNo)="" set bankTradeNo="合计" set bankTradeAmt=bankTradeTotalSum do OutputBankTradeDetails
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK
OutputBankTradeDetails set Data=$lb(bankTradeNo,terminalNo,bankTradeType,bankTradeAmt,bankTradeDate,bankTradeTime,hisTradeNo) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit } */

Query.name: FindHISTradeDetail
Query.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-23 Description: 查询HIS业务明细 Input: Output: Debug: do ##class(%ResultSet).RunQuery("web.DHCBillReconciliations","FindHISTradeDetail")

Method.name: FindHISTradeDetailExecute
Method.Implementation:
set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ^tempwml("FindHISTradeDetail")=$lb(stDate,endDate,transType,payChannel,patientNo,hospDR) set ind=1 set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate)
set patientId="" if (patientNo'="") do .set patientId=$o(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",patientNo,""))
set tradeTotalAmt=0
for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(date) .//门诊预交金 .if (transType'="I") do ..set accM="0" ..for set accM=$o(^DHCACDi("AccM",0,"APDDate",date,accM)) quit:(accM="") do ...set papmi=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",accM),"^",2) ...;quit:(+papmi=0) ...;quit:((patientId'="")&&(patientId'=papmi)) ...set patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL")),"^",1) ...set regNo=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1)),"^",1) ...set accPreSub="0" ...for set accPreSub=$o(^DHCACDi("AccM",0,"APDDate",date,accM,"AccPD",accPreSub)) quit:(accPreSub="") do ....set accPreInfo=$g(^DHCACD("AccM",accM,"AccPD",accPreSub)) ....;quit:(accPreInfo="") ....set preHospDR=$p(accPreInfo,"^",15) ....;quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=preHospDR)) ....set tradeTime=$p(accPreInfo,"^",4) ....set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ....set userDR=$p(accPreInfo,"^",5) ....set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ....set accPMSub=$o(^DHCACD("AccM",accM,"AccPD",accPreSub,"P","0")) ....;quit:(accPMSub="") ....set accPMInfo=$g(^DHCACD("AccM",accM,"AccPD",accPreSub,"P",accPMSub)) ....set paymDR=$p(accPMInfo,"^",1) ....quit:('$d(^User.DHCCTPayModeExpI("PMEPayModeDRIndex"," OP",(" "_paymDR)))) //过滤非第三方支付的 ....;quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ....quit:paymDR'="4" //过滤掉非银行卡的 add by wangminglong 2019-1-28 ....set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ....b ;w1 ....set tradeAmt=$p(accPMInfo,"^",6) ....;quit:(+tradeAmt=0) ....set tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt ....set tradeType="" ....if (+tradeAmt>0) do .....set tradeType="门诊预交金扣款" ....else do .....set tradeType="门诊预交金退款" ....set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TTypePM","PRE","PayM",(accM_"||"_accPreSub_"||"_accPMSub),"0")) ....set bankTradeNo="", hisTradeNo="", tradeMsg="" ....if (+IBPRowId'=0) do .....set tradeRc=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",1) //IBP_Rc .....if (tradeRc="00") do ......set tradeMsg="交易成功" .....set bankTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",7) //银行交易流水号 .....set hisTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",32) //订单号 ....do OutputHISTradeDetail ..//门诊收费 ..set rowId="0" ..for set rowId=$o(^DHCINVPRT(0,"Date",date,rowId)) quit:(rowId="") do ...set invInfo=$g(^DHCINVPRT(rowId)) ...quit:(invInfo="") ...set invHospDR=$p(invInfo,"^",39) ...quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=invHospDR)) ...set papmi=$p(invInfo,"^",15) ...quit:(+papmi=0) ...quit:((patientId'="")&&(patientId'=papmi)) ...set patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL")),"^",1) ...set regNo=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1)),"^",1) ...set userDR=$p(invInfo,"^",21) ...set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ...set tradeTime=$p(invInfo,"^",20) ...set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ...set invPMSub="0" ...for set invPMSub=$o(^DHCINVPRT(rowId,"P",invPMSub)) quit:(invPMSub="") do ....set paymInfo=$g(^DHCINVPRT(rowId,"P",invPMSub)) ....quit:(paymInfo="") ....set paymDR=$p(paymInfo,"^",1) ....quit:('$d(^User.DHCCTPayModeExpI("PMEPayModeDRIndex"," OP",(" "_paymDR)))) //过滤非第三方支付的 ....quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ....quit:paymDR'="4" //过滤掉非银行卡的 add by wangminglong 2019-1-28 ....set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ....b ;w2 ....set tradeAmt=$p(paymInfo,"^",3) ....set tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt ....set tradeType="" ....if (+tradeAmt>0) do .....set tradeType="门诊收费扣款" ....else do .....set tradeType="门诊收费退款" ....set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TTypePM","OP","PayM",(rowId_"||"_invPMSub),"0")) ....set bankTradeNo="", hisTradeNo="", tradeMsg="" ....if (+IBPRowId'=0) do .....set tradeRc=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",1) //IBP_Rc .....if (tradeRc="00") do ......set tradeMsg="交易成功" .....set bankTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",7) //银行交易流水号 .....set hisTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",32) //订单号 ....do OutputHISTradeDetail .if (transType'="O") do ..//住院押金 ..set rowId="0" ..for set rowId=$o(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(0,"PrtDate",date,rowId)) quit:(rowId="") do ...set depInfo=$g(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(rowId)) ...quit:(depInfo="") ...set depDeptDR=$p(depInfo,"^",37) //prt_currdept_dr ...set depHospDR=##class(web.UDHCHospitalGroup).GetHospitalIDByLocID(depDeptDR) ...quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=depHospDR)) ...set userDR=$p(depInfo,"^",14) ...set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ...set tradeTime=$p(depInfo,"^",3) ...set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ...set adm=$p(depInfo,"^",4) ...set papmi=$p(^PAADM(adm),"^",1) ...quit:(+papmi=0) ...quit:((patientId'="")&&(patientId'=papmi)) ...set patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL")),"^",1) ...set regNo=$p(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1),"^",1) ...set paymDR=$p(depInfo,"^",9) ...quit:('$d(^User.DHCCTPayModeExpI("PMEPayModeDRIndex",(" "_paymDR)))) //过滤非第三方支付的 ...quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ...quit:paymDR'="4" //过滤掉非银行卡的 add by wangminglong 2019-1-28 ...set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ...b ;w3 ...set tradeAmt=$p(depInfo,"^",6) ...set tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt ...set tradeType="" ...if (+tradeAmt>0) do ....set tradeType="住院押金扣款" ...else do ....set tradeType="住院押金退款" ...set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TTypePM","DEP","PayM",rowId,"0")) ...set bankTradeNo="", hisTradeNo="", tradeMsg="" ...if (+IBPRowId'=0) do ....set tradeRc=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",1) //IBP_Rc ....if (tradeRc="00") do .....set tradeMsg="交易成功" ....set bankTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",7) //银行交易流水号 ....set hisTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",32) //订单号 ...do OutputHISTradeDetail ..//出院结算 ..set rowId="0" ..for set rowId=$o(^DHCINVPRTZY(0,"DATE",date,rowId)) quit:(rowId="") do ...set invInfo=$g(^DHCINVPRTZY(rowId)) ...quit:(invInfo="") ...set adm=$p(invInfo,"^",4) ...set admHospDR=##class(web.UDHCHospitalGroup).GetHospitalByAdm(adm) ...quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=admHospDR)) ...set userDR=$p(invInfo,"^",7) ...set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ...set tradeTime=$p(invInfo,"^",3) ...set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ...set papmi=$p(^PAADM(adm),"^",1) ...quit:(+papmi=0) ...quit:((patientId'="")&&(patientId'=papmi)) ...set patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL")),"^",1) ...set regNo=$p($g(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1)),"^",1) ...set arrcp=$p(invInfo,"^",17) //PRT_ARRCP_DR ...set arrPMSub="0" ...for set arrPMSub=$o(^ARRCP(arrcp,"PAYM",arrPMSub)) quit:(arrPMSub="") do ....set paymInfo=$g(^ARRCP(arrcp,"PAYM",arrPMSub)) ....quit:(paymInfo="") ....set paymDR=$p(paymInfo,"^",1) ....quit:('$d(^User.DHCCTPayModeExpI("PMEPayModeDRIndex",(" "_paymDR)))) //过滤非第三方支付的 ....quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ....quit:paymDR'="4" //过滤掉非银行卡的 add by wangminglong 2019-1-28 ....set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ....b ;w4 ....set tradeAmt=$p(paymInfo,"^",3) ....set tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt ....set tradeType="" ....if (+tradeAmt>0) do .....set tradeType="出院结算扣款" ....else do .....set tradeType="出院结算退款" ....set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TTypePM","IP","PayM",(arrcp_"||"_arrPMSub),"0")) ....set bankTradeNo="", hisTradeNo="", tradeMsg="" ....if (+IBPRowId'=0) do .....set tradeRc=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",1) //IBP_Rc .....if (tradeRc="00") do ......set tradeMsg="交易成功" .....set bankTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",7) //银行交易流水号 .....set hisTradeNo=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId),"^",32) //订单号 ....do OutputHISTradeDetail
set (patName, tradeMsg, bankTradeNo, tradeType, userName, paymDesc, tradeDate, tradeTime, hisTradeNo)="" set regNo="合计" set tradeAmt=tradeTotalAmt do OutputHISTradeDetail
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK OutputHISTradeDetail set Data=$lb(regNo,patName,tradeMsg,bankTradeNo,tradeAmt,paymDesc,tradeType,userName,tradeDate,tradeTime,hisTradeNo) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

Query.name: FindHISBankTradeDetail
Query.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-26 Description: 查询HIS交易明细 Input: Output: Debug: do ##class(%ResultSet).RunQuery("web.DHCBillReconciliations","FindHISBankTradeDetail","01/03/2018","26/03/2018","","","","2")

Method.name: FindHISBankTradeDetailExecute
Method.Implementation:
set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1 set ^tempwml("FindHISBankTradeDetail")=$lb(stDate,endDate,transType,payChannel,patientNo,hospDR) set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate) set patientId="" if (patientNo'="") do .set patientId=$o(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",patientNo,""))
set hisTradeTotalAmt=0 set bankTradeTotalAmt=0
for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set IBPRowId="0" .for set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCBILLETPi(0,"TradeDate",date,IBPRowId)) quit:(IBPRowId="") do ..s papmiDr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",40) ..q:papmiDr="" ..s regNo=$p($g(^PAPER(papmiDr,"PAT",1)),"^",1) //登记号 ..s patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmiDr,"ALL")),"^",1) //姓名 ..q:(papmiDr'=patientId)&&(patientId'="") //排除登记号查询的其他信息 ..s userDr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",24) ..s groupdr=$p($g(^SSU("SSUSR",userDr)),"^",5) //安全组 ..s userName="" //操作人员 ..if (userDr'="") set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDr),"^",2) ..s paymode=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",45) ..q:paymode="" ..s paymDesc=$p($g(^CT("CTPM",paymode)),"^",2) //支付渠道 ..q:paymode'="4" //排除银行卡外的其他支付渠道 ..s paysuccessfalg=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",1) //支付成功标志 ..q:paysuccessfalg'="00" //排除掉支付不成功的记录 ..s bankTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",5) //交易流水号 ..s terminalNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",9) //终端号 ..s tradeTypedr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",26) //交易类型标志 C扣款,其他退款 ..s bankTradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",4) //银行交易金额 ..s TradeChannel=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",31) ..i (groupdr="10")&&(tradeTypedr="C") s bankTradeAmt=bankTradeAmt/100 //一体机扣款需要把单位分换位元 ..i TradeChannel="POSHL" d ...s bankTradeAmt=bankTradeAmt/100 ..s hisTradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",23) //HIS交易金额 ..i tradeTypedr="C" d ...s tradeType="扣款" ...s bankTradeAmt=bankTradeAmt ...s hisTradeAmt=hisTradeAmt ..e d ...s tradeType="退款" ...s bankTradeAmt=0-bankTradeAmt ...s hisTradeAmt=0-hisTradeAmt ..s hisTradeTotalAmt=hisTradeTotalAmt+hisTradeAmt //HIS交易金额合计 ..s bankTradeTotalAmt=bankTradeTotalAmt+bankTradeAmt //银行交易金额合计 ..s tradeDate=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",21) //交易日期 ..s tradeDate=$zd(tradeDate,3) ..s tradeTime=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",22) //交易时间 ..s tradeTime=$zt(tradeTime,1) ..s hisTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",47) //订单号 ..do OutputHISBankTradeDetail
set (regNo,patName,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,tradeType,bankTradeAmt,tradeDate,tradeTime,hisTradeAmt,hisTradeNo)="" set regNo="合计" set hisTradeAmt=hisTradeTotalAmt set bankTradeAmt=bankTradeTotalAmt do OutputHISBankTradeDetail
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK OutputHISBankTradeDetail set Data=$lb(regNo,patName,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,tradeType,bankTradeAmt,tradeDate,tradeTime,hisTradeAmt,hisTradeNo) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content:
/* ClassMethod FindHISBankTradeDetailExecute(ByRef qHandle As %Binary, stDate As %String, endDate As %String, transType As %String, payChannel As %String, patientNo As %String, hospDR As %String) As %Status { set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1 set ^tempwml("FindHISBankTradeDetail")=$lb(stDate,endDate,transType,payChannel,patientNo,hospDR) set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate)
set patientId="" if (patientNo'="") do .set patientId=$o(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",patientNo,""))
set hisTradeTotalAmt=0 set bankTradeTotalAmt=0
for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set IBPRowId="0" .for set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TradeDate",date,IBPRowId)) quit:(IBPRowId="") do ..b ;w1 ..set tradeInfo=$g(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId)) ..quit:(tradeInfo="") ..set tradeRc=$p(tradeInfo,"^",1) ..quit:(tradeRc'="00") ..set tradeType=$p(tradeInfo,"^",26) ..quit:((transType="O")&&(("^PRE^OP^")'[("^"_tradeType_"^"))) ..quit:((transType="I")&&(("^DEP^IP^")'[("^"_tradeType_"^"))) ..set tradeType=..GetTradeTypeDesc(tradeType) ..set tradeHospDR=$p(tradeInfo,"^",28) ..quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=tradeHospDR)) ..set userDR=$p(tradeInfo,"^",25) ..set userName="" ..if (userDR'="") set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ..set tradeDate=$p(tradeInfo,"^",21) //HIS交易日期 ..set tradeTime=$p(tradeInfo,"^",22) //HIS交易时间 ..set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(tradeDate) ..set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ..set bankTradeDate=$p(tradeInfo,"^",14) //银行交易日期 ..set bankTradeTime=$p(tradeInfo,"^",15) //银行交易时间 ..set bankTradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(bankTradeDate) ..set bankTradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(bankTradeTime, 1) ..set IBPConSub=$o(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C","0")) ..set papmi="", paymDR="" ..if (IBPConSub'="") do ...set subPayModeDR=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C",IBPConSub),"^",3) ...set subTradeType=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C",IBPConSub),"^",6) ...if (subTradeType="PRE") do ....set papmi=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",+subPayModeDR),"^",2) ....set paymDR=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",+subPayModeDR,"AccPD",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2),"P",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",3)),"^",3) ...else if (subTradeType="OP") do ....set papmi=$p($g(^DHCINVPRT(+subPayModeDR)),"^",15) ....set paymDR=$p($g(^DHCINVPRT(+subPayModeDR,"P",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2))),"^",1) ...else if (subTradeType="DEP") do ....set adm=$p(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(+subPayModeDR),"^",4) ....set papmi=$p(^PAADM(adm),"^",1) ....set paymDR=$p(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(+subPayModeDR),"^",9) ...else if (subTradeType="IP") do ....set papmi=$p(^ARRCP(+subPayModeDR),"^",30) ....set paymDR=$p(^ARRCP(+subPayModeDR,"PAYM",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2)),"^",1) ..quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ..quit:((patientId'="")&&(patientId'=papmi)) ..set paymDesc="" ..if (+paymDR'=0) set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ..set regNo="", patName="" ..if (papmi'="") do ...set regNo=$p(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1),"^",1) ...set patName=$p(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL"),"^",1) ..set terminalNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",9) //IBP_Tid ..set bankTradeAmt=$p(tradeInfo,"^",4) //交易金额 ..set bankTradeType=$p(tradeInfo,"^",24) //IBP_BankTradeType ..if (bankTradeType="C") do ...set bankTradeTotalAmt=bankTradeTotalAmt+bankTradeAmt ...set bankTradeType=tradeType_"扣款" ..else do ...set bankTradeTotalAmt=bankTradeTotalAmt-bankTradeAmt ...set bankTradeType=tradeType_"退款" ..set bankTradeNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",7) //银行交易流水号 ..set hisTradeNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",32) //订单号 ..set hisTradeAmt=$p(tradeInfo,"^",23) //应收金额 ..set hisTradeTotalAmt=hisTradeTotalAmt+hisTradeAmt ..do OutputHISBankTradeDetail
set (patName, userName, paymDesc, bankTradeNo, terminalNo, tradeType, tradeDate, tradeTime, hisTradeNo)="" set regNo="合计" set hisTradeAmt=hisTradeTotalAmt set bankTradeAmt=bankTradeTotalAmt do OutputHISBankTradeDetail
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK OutputHISBankTradeDetail set Data=$lb(regNo,patName,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,tradeType,bankTradeAmt,tradeDate,tradeTime,hisTradeAmt,hisTradeNo) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit } */

set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ^tempwml("FindHISTradeDetail")=$lb(stDate,endDate,transType,payChannel,result,hospDR) set ind=1 set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set ;过滤交易日期与HIS业务发生日期不是当天的 .....s hisTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(EtpRowID)),"^",47) //订单号 .....q:hisTradeNo="" ;没有订单号无法对账也过滤 .....;s hisTradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",23) //HIS交易金额 .....s hisSerial=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(EtpRowID)),"^",12) //HIS交易流水号 .....s histradeType=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(EtpRowID)),"^",26) .....;根据订单号循环第三方交易明细表的订单记录 .....s etbrowid="" .....s bankTradeTotalSum=0 .....s TradeAmt=0 .....s HisFlag=0 .....f s etbrowid=$o(^DHCBILLETBi(0,"OutTradeNo",hisTradeNo,etbrowid)) q:etbrowid=""||(HisFlag=1) d ......s TradeFlag=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",4) //第三方交易类型 ......s bankSerial=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",5) //银行交易流水号 ......i (histradeType="C") Q:TradeFlag="1" ......e Q:TradeFlag="0" ......i (hisSerial'="")&&(bankSerial=hisSerial) s HisFlag=1 .....;根据订单号循环第三方交易明细表的订单记录 .....s etbrowid="" .....s bankTradeTotalSum=0 .....s TradeAmt=0 .....s HisFlag=0 .....f s etbrowid=$o(^DHCBILLETBi(0,"OutTradeNo",hisTradeNo,etbrowid)) q:etbrowid=""||(HisFlag=1) d ......s TradeFlag=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",4) //第三方交易类型 ......s bankSerial=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",5) //银行交易流水号 ......i (histradeType="C") Q:TradeFlag="1" ......e Q:TradeFlag="0" ......i (hisSerial'="")&&(bankSerial=hisSerial) s HisFlag=1 //当同一个订单号中的HIS流水号和银行流水号一样时去掉 ......s TradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",3) //第三方交易金额 ......i TradeFlag="0" set TradeAmt=TradeAmt ......i TradeFlag="1" set TradeAmt=0-TradeAmt ......if TradeAmt-tradeAmt=0 s judgeResult="平账" ......if TradeAmt-tradeAmt>0 s judgeResult="第三方多" ...;s TradeTotalAmt=TradeTotalAmt+TradeAmt //第三方合计总金额 ...do OutputJudgeTradePay

AccSub=$o(^DHCACDi("AccM",0,"APDDate",date,AccRowid,"AccPD",AccSub)) quit:(AccSub="") do ....s AccRowidSub=AccRowid_"||"_AccSub ....s paymode=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",AccRowid,"AccPD",AccSub,"P",1),"^",1) ....s paymDesc=$p($g(^CT("CTPM",paymode)),"^",2) //支付渠道 ....q:paymode'=4 //排除银行卡外的其他支付渠道 ....s papmiDr=$p($g(^DHCACD("AccM",AccRowid)),"^",2) ....q:papmiDr="" ....s tradeDate=$p($g(^DHCACD("AccM",AccRowid,"AccPD",AccSub)),"^",3) //交易日期 ....s bankTradeDate=$zd(tradeDate,3) ....s tradeTime=$p($g(^DHCACD("AccM",AccRowid,"AccPD",AccSub)),"^",4) //交易时间 ....s ;$p($g(^DHCACD("AccM",AccRowid,"AccPD",AccSub)),"^",2) //HIS交易金额 ....i tradeAmt>0 s bankTradeType="扣费" //交易类型 ....e s bankTradeType="退费" //交易类型 ....;s tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt //HIS合计总金额 ..;循环同一个订单号的退费记录获取该订单号的退费总金额 ..for set myRefIBP=$o(^DHCBILLETPi(0,"RRN",(hisTradeNo),myRefIBP)) quit:myRefIBP="" do ...set Refpaysuccessfalg=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(myRefIBP)),"^",1) //支付成功标志 ...q:Refpaysuccessfalg'="00" //排除掉支付不成功的记录 ...s Refpaymode=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(myRefIBP)),"^",45) ...q:(Refpaymode="")||(Refpaymode'="4") //排除银行卡外的其他支付渠道 ...s RefhisTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(myRefIBP)),"^",47) //订单号 ...q:RefhisTradeNo="" ...s RefhisTradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(myRefIBP)),"^",23) //HIS交易金额 ...s RefhistradeType=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(myRefIBP)),"^",26) //His交易类型标志 C扣款,其他退款 ...q:RefhistradeType="C" ...s myRefAmt=myRefAmt-RefhisTradeAmt
..;根据订单号循环第三方交易明细表的订单记录 ..s etbrowid="" ..s bankTradeTotalSum=0 ..s TradeAmt=0 ..s HisFlag=0 ..f s etbrowid=$o(^DHCBILLETBi(0,"OutTradeNo",hisTradeNo,etbrowid)) q:etbrowid=""||(HisFlag=1) d ...s TradeFlag=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",4) //第三方交易类型 ...s bankSerial=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",5) //银行交易流水号 ...i (histradeType="C") Q:TradeFlag="1" ...e Q:TradeFlag="0" ...i (hisSerial'="")&&(bankSerial=hisSerial) s HisFlag=1 //当同一个订单号中的HIS流水号和银行流水号不一样时去掉 ...s TradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(etbrowid)),"^",3) //第三方交易金额 ...i TradeFlag="0" set TradeAmt=TradeAmt ...i TradeFlag="1" set TradeAmt=0-TradeAmt
..//平账 ..q:(result="B")&&(HisFlag=0) //HISFlag=0 表示同一个订单同一个流水号,HIS交易表有第三方交易表没有 即HIS记录多 ..//HIS多 ..q:(result="H")&&(HisFlag=1) //HISFlag=1 表示同一个订单同一个流水号,HIS交易表有第三方交易表都有 即平账
..s papmiDr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",40) ..q:papmiDr="" ..s regNo=$p($g(^PAPER(papmiDr,"PAT",1)),"^",1) //登记号 ..s patName=$p($g(^PAPER(papmiDr,"ALL")),"^",1) //姓名 ..s userDr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",24) ..s userName="" //操作人员 ..if (userDr'="") set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDr),"^",2) ..s bankTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",12) //交易流水号 ..s tradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",23) //HIS交易金额 ..s tradeTypedr=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",26) //交易类型标志 C扣款,其他退款 ..i tradeTypedr="C" d ...s bankTradeType="扣费" ...s tradeAmt=tradeAmt ..e d ...s bankTradeType="退费" ...s tradeAmt=0-tradeAmt ..s tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt //HIS合计总金额 ..s TradeTotalAmt=TradeTotalAmt+TradeAmt //第三方合计总金额 ..s tradeDate=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",21) //交易日期 ..s bankTradeDate=$zd(tradeDate,3) ..s tradeTime=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",22) //交易时间 ..s bankTradeTime=$zt(tradeTime,1)
..i result="B" d ...s judgeResult="平账" ..i result="H" d ...s judgeResult="HIS多"
..//查询全部 ..i ((result="A")&&(HisFlag=1)) d ...s judgeResult="平账" ..i ((result="A")&&(HisFlag=0)) d ...s judgeResult="HIS多"
..s hisTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",47) //订单号 ..s terminalNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",9) //终端号 ..s resultMsg="0" ..do OutputJudgeTradePay }
//第三方多的记录数据 根据时间循环第三方交易表 if (result="T")||(result="A") { for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set ETBRowid="" .set bankTradeTotalSum=0 .f set ETBRowid=$o(^DHCBILLETBi(0,"TradeDate",date,ETBRowid)) q:ETBRowid="" d ..set (regNo,patName,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,bankTradeType,TradeAmt,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeDate,bankTradeTime,judgeResult,hisTradeNo,resultMsg,tradeAmt)="" ..s hisTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",12) //订单号 ..s bankTradeNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",5) //交易流水号 ..s terminalNo=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",7) //终端号 ..s tradeFlag=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",4) //第三方交易类型 ..s TradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",3) //第三方交易金额 ..i tradeFlag="0" set bankTradeType="扣费" set TradeAmt=TradeAmt ..i tradeFlag="1" set bankTradeType="退费" set TradeAmt=0-TradeAmt ..s paymode=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",14) ..q:(paymode="")||(paymode'="4") //排除银行卡外的其他支付渠道 ..s paymDesc=$p($g(^CT("CTPM",paymode)),"^",2) //支付渠道 ..s bankTradeDate=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",1) //交易日期 ..s bankTradeTime=$p($g(^DHCBILLETB(ETBRowid)),"^",2) //交易时间 ..s bankTradeDate=$zd(bankTradeDate,3) ..s bankTradeTime=$zt(bankTradeTime,1) ..s judgeResult="第三方多" ..s resultMsg="0"
..;根据订单号循环HIS交易表 ..set IBPRowId="",myRefAmt=0,tradeAmt=0,flag=0 ..for set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCBILLETPi(0,"RRN",(hisTradeNo),IBPRowId)) quit:(IBPRowId="")||(flag=1) do ...s Refpaysuccessfalg=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",1) //支付成功标志 ...q:Refpaysuccessfalg'="00" //排除掉支付不成功的记录 ...s hisSerial=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",12) //HIS交易流水号 ...s histradeType=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",26) //His交易类型标志 C扣款,其他退款 ...s tradeAmt=$p($g(^DHCBILLETP(IBPRowId)),"^",23) //HIS交易金额 ...i (tradeFlag="1") Q:histradeType="C" // ...e Q:histradeType'="C" ...i hisSerial=bankTradeNo s flag=1 ;//flag=1时表示同一个订单同一个流水号，HIS交易表和第三方交易表都有记录
..q:flag=1 //flag=1时表示同一个订单同一个流水号，HIS交易表和第三方交易表都有记录，把有相同的记录去掉 ..s tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt //HIS交易总金额 ..s TradeTotalAmt=TradeTotalAmt+TradeAmt //第三方交易总金额 ..do OutputJudgeTradePay } */
set (regNo,patName,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,bankTradeType,TradeAmt,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeDate,bankTradeTime,judgeResult,hisTradeNo,resultMsg,tradeAmt)="" set regNo="合计" set tradeAmt=tradeTotalAmt set TradeAmt=TradeTotalAmt do OutputJudgeTradePay
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK OutputJudgeTradePay q:((result="B")&&((judgeResult="HIS多")||(judgeResult="第三方多"))) q:((result="H")&&((judgeResult="平账")||(judgeResult="第三方多"))) q:((result="T")&&((judgeResult="平账")||(judgeResult="HIS多"))) s TradeTotalAmt=TradeTotalAmt+TradeAmt //第三方交易总金额 s tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt //HIS交易总金额 set Data=$lb(regNo,patName,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,bankTradeType,TradeAmt,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeDate,bankTradeTime,judgeResult,hisTradeNo,resultMsg,tradeAmt) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content:
/* ClassMethod JudgeTradePayExecute(ByRef qHandle As %Binary, stDate As %String, endDate As %String, transType As %String, payChannel As %String, result As %String, hospDR As %String) As %Status { set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) set ind=1 set stDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(stDate) set endDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(endDate)
set tradeTotalAmt=0 set job=$j kill ^||TMP(job)
for date=stDate:1:endDate do .set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(date) .set IBPRowId="0" .for set IBPRowId=$o(^DHCINVBTPi(0,"TradeDate",date,IBPRowId)) quit:(IBPRowId="") do ..set tradeInfo=$g(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId)) ..quit:(tradeInfo="") ..set tradeRc=$p(tradeInfo,"^",1) ..quit:(tradeRc'="00") ..set hisTradeNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",32) //订单号 ..set tradeAmt=$p(tradeInfo,"^",23) //应收金额 ..set tradeType=$p(tradeInfo,"^",26) ..quit:((transType="O")&&(("^PRE^OP^")'[("^"_tradeType_"^"))) ..quit:((transType="I")&&(("^DEP^IP^")'[("^"_tradeType_"^"))) ..set tradeType=..GetTradeTypeDesc(tradeType) ..set tradeHospDR=$p(tradeInfo,"^",28) ..quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=tradeHospDR)) ..set userDR=$p(tradeInfo,"^",25) ..set userName="" ..if (userDR'="") set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ..set tradeDate=$p(tradeInfo,"^",21) //HIS交易日期 ..set tradeTime=$p(tradeInfo,"^",22) //HIS交易时间 ..set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(tradeDate) ..set tradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(tradeTime, 1) ..set bankTradeDate=$p(tradeInfo,"^",14) //银行交易日期 ..set bankTradeTime=$p(tradeInfo,"^",15) //银行交易时间 ..set bankTradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(bankTradeDate) ..set bankTradeTime=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(bankTradeTime, 1) ..set IBPConSub=$o(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C","0")) ..set papmi="", paymDR="" ..if (IBPConSub'="") do ...set subPayModeDR=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C",IBPConSub),"^",3) ...set subTradeType=$p(^DHCINVBTP(IBPRowId,"C",IBPConSub),"^",6) ...if (subTradeType="PRE") do ....set papmi=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",+subPayModeDR),"^",2) ....set paymDR=$p(^DHCACD("AccM",+subPayModeDR,"AccPD",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2),"P",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",3)),"^",3) ...else if (subTradeType="OP") do ....set papmi=$p($g(^DHCINVPRT(+subPayModeDR)),"^",15) ....set paymDR=$p($g(^DHCINVPRT(+subPayModeDR,"P",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2))),"^",1) ...else if (subTradeType="DEP") do ....set adm=$p(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(+subPayModeDR),"^",4) ....set papmi=$p(^PAADM(adm),"^",1) ....set paymDR=$p(^DHCSFPRINTDETAIL(+subPayModeDR),"^",9) ...else if (subTradeType="IP") do ....set papmi=$p(^ARRCP(+subPayModeDR),"^",30) ....set paymDR=$p(^ARRCP(+subPayModeDR,"PAYM",$p(subPayModeDR,"||",2)),"^",1) ..quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ..set paymDesc="" ..if (+paymDR'=0) set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ..set regNo="", patName="" ..if (papmi'="") do ...set regNo=$p(^PAPER(papmi,"PAT",1),"^",1) ...set patName=$p(^PAPER(papmi,"ALL"),"^",1) ..set terminalNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",9) //IBP_Tid ..set bankTradeType=$p(tradeInfo,"^",24) //IBP_BankTradeType ..if (bankTradeType="C") do ...set bankTradeType=tradeType_"扣款" ..else do ...set bankTradeType=tradeType_"退款" ..set bankTradeNo=$p(tradeInfo,"^",7) //银行交易流水号 ..set IBTRowId=$o(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceI("TRADENO",hisTradeNo,"")) ..if (IBTRowId'="") do ...set ^||TMP(job,IBTRowId)=IBTRowId ...set IBTAmt=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),12) //银行交易金额 ...//set IBTAmt=$fn(IBTAmt/100,"",2) ...set resultMsg="" ...if ($zabs($fn(tradeAmt,"",2))=$zabs($fn(IBTAmt,"",2))) do ....set judgeResult="平账" ...else do ....if ($zabs($fn(tradeAmt,"",2))>$zabs($fn(IBTAmt,"",2))) do .....set judgeResult="HIS多" ....else do .....set judgeResult="第三方多" ....set resultMsg="HIS交易金额:"_$zabs($fn(tradeAmt,"",2))_", "_"回款金额："_$zabs($fn(IBTAmt,"",2)) ..else do ...set judgeResult="HIS多" ...set resultMsg="HIS存在交易记录,回款中不存在记录,交易表ID:"_IBPRowId ..quit:((result="B")&&(judgeResult'="")) ..quit:((result="H")&&(judgeResult="第三方多")) ..quit:((result="T")&&(judgeResult="HIS多")) ..set tradeTotalAmt=tradeTotalAmt+tradeAmt ..do OutputJudgeTradePay .if (result'="H") do ..//取对账表差错信息 ..set IBTRowId="0" ..for set IBTRowId=$o(^User.DHCINVAliBalanceI("BANKFINDATE",date,IBTRowId)) quit:(IBTRowId="") do ...quit:$d(^||TMP(job,IBTRowId)) ...set judgeResult="第三方多" ...set resultMsg="交易回款中有记录,HIS无对应成功交易记录,回款表ID"_IBTRowId ...set bankTradeNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),5) //银行交易流水号 ...set hisTradeNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),7) //订单号 ...set terminalNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),11) //交易终端号 ...set myHospDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),9) ...quit:((hospDR'="")&&(hospDR'=myHospDR)) ...set hospName="" ...if (+myHospDR'=0) set hospName=$p(^CT("HOSP",myHospDR),"^",2) ...set trannelNo=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),15) //渠道代码 ...set paymDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),10) ...quit:((payChannel'="")&&(payChannel'=paymDR)) ...set paymDesc="" ...if (+paymDR'=0) set paymDesc=$p(^CT("CTPM",paymDR),"^",2) ...set userDR=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),16) ...set userName="" ...if (+userDR'=0) set userName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",userDR),"^",2) ...set hisTradeTime=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),8) //yyyyMMddHHmmss ...set tradeDate=$e(hisTradeTime,1,8) ...set tradeDate=$zdh(tradeDate,8) ...set tradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(tradeDate) //HIS交易日期 ...set tradeTime=$e(hisTradeTime,9,10)_":"_$e(hisTradeTime,11,12)_":"_$e(hisTradeTime,13,14) //HIS交易时间 ...set tradeFlag=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),13) ...set bankTradeType="" ...if (+tradeFlag=0) set bankTradeType="扣费" ...if (+tradeFlag=1) set bankTradeType="退费" ...set tradeAmt=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),12) //银行交易金额 ...//set bankTradeAmt=$fn(bankTradeAmt/100,"",2) ...if (+tradeFlag=0) set tradeTotalSum=tradeTotalSum+tradeAmt ...if (+tradeFlag=1) set tradeTotalSum=tradeTotalSum-tradeAmt ...set tradeTradeDateTime=$LIST(^User.DHCINVBankBalanceD(IBTRowId),6) ...set bankTradeDate=$e(tradeTxtDateTime,1,8) ...set bankTradeTime=$zdh(tradeTxtDateTime,8) ...set bankTradeDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(bankTradeDate) ...set bankTradeTime=$e(tradeTradeDateTime,9,10)_":"_$e(tradeTradeDateTime,11,12)_":"_$e(tradeTradeDateTime,13,14) ...do OutputJudgeTradePay
set (patName, bankTradeNo, terminalNo, bankTradeType, userName, paymDesc, bankTradeDate, bankTradeTime, hisTradeNo, judgeResult, resultMsg)="" set regNo="合计" set tradeAmt=tradeTotalAmt do OutputJudgeTradePay
set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) quit $$$OK OutputJudgeTradePay set Data=$lb(regNo,patName,bankTradeNo,terminalNo,bankTradeType,tradeAmt,userName,paymDesc,bankTradeDate,bankTradeTime,judgeResult,hisTradeNo,resultMsg) set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data set ind=ind+1 quit } */

Method.name: GetTradeTypeDesc
Method.Description: Creator: ZhYW CreatDate: 2018-03-26 Description: 取交易类型描述 Input: Output: Debug: w ##class(web.DHCBillReconciliations).GetTradeTypeDesc("OP")
Method.Implementation: new (code) set desc=$case(code, "CARD":"卡费", "PRE":"门诊预交金", "OP":"门诊收费", "DEP":"住院押金", "IP":"出院结算", :"") quit desc
